mapper.select: /* tbl_record 조회 SelectLocalList */ SELECT '/data/recdata/' || REC_DATE || '/' || to_char(REC_START_TIME,'HH24') || '/' || REC_FILENAME AS FileList FROM tbl_record WHERE 1=1 AND REC_DATM BETWEEN to_date(#{check_date} || ' 00:00:00' ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{check_date} || ' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND NVL(REC_STORE_CODE,'0') = '0'

/* tbl_record 조회 SelectStorageList */ SELECT '/storage/' || REC_DATE || '/' || to_char(REC_START_TIME,'HH24') || '/' || REC_FILENAME AS FileList FROM tbl_record WHERE 1=1 AND REC_DATM BETWEEN to_date(#{check_date} || ' 00:00:00' ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(#{check_date} || ' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND NVL(REC_STORE_CODE,'0') = '0'
